captions.text:
I get excited
I get sleepless nights
I get stupid giggles like crazy

It is love
I wanted to call you my love
I wasn’t brave enough

It is you
All my heart for you
I just say it alone

Come on, you
I love you

Come on, you
The words almost come out

Cause of you
I shout aloud

Cause of you
Only in my mind

If I say it now,
I might not see you again
Then I can’t live anymore

Cause of you. Loving you
Please tell me

I get hurt
I get tears

I get a broken heart and 
see you at a distance

It is love
I wanted to call you my love
I wasn’t brave enough

It is you
All my heart for you
I just say it alone

Come on, you
I love you

Come on, you
The words almost come out

Cause of you
I shout aloud

Cause of you
I shout aloud

Cause of you
Only in my mind

If I say it now, 
I might not see you again
Then I can’t live anymore

Cause of you. Loving you
Please tell me

It might be nothing
But it bothers me

All day long, I can’t do anything, 
thinking of you
It’s getting more serious

In front of you
I feel like I’m nothing

My eyes only see you
My heart only for you

Cause of you
I shout aloud

Cause of you
I love you

If I say it now, 
I might not see you again
Then I can’t live anymore

Cause of you. Loving you
Please tell me

comments.text:
O.O Jiae... I mean Hana has changed so much since 2009. I know this might 
sound really stupid and might even annoy some hardcore Jevice fans but I 
promised that I would support T-ara forever including any member that left 
the group. I honestly love Jevice and I've only known of them for a day, I 
wish I knew that Jiae... Sorry, Hana was here earlier. They are both so 
talented. I know she could have naturally gotten older but, out of 
curiosity, did Hana have surgery? Not that there's anything wrong, I 
honestly couldn't care less but she looks so different.  But then again it 
was many years ago so, it's not necessarily surgery. What are Jevice fans 
called? Sorry for making this so long and asking too many questions, I'm 
just so excited and happy to be able to listen to Hana-noona! :3 ﻿

comments.text:
Hana/Jiae and Jiwon left T-ara pre-debut because they didn't agree with the 
music style. I agree, they don't fit T-ara at all xp So Qri, Boram, and 
Soyeon became members instead. Fun fact: In 2007, Jiwon was supposed to 
debut with G.Na, Wonder Girls's Yubin, After School's UEE, and Secret's 
Hyosung under the group Five Girls. Unfortunately, their company was having 
financial problems, so they had to disband and eventually joined different 
companies xp
